naslov: MALI LOŠINJ: AUTENTIČNA VILA ZA ODMOR! (prodaja)
opis: Nerezine: Prekrasna, unikatna i starinska vila izgrađena 1968. godine po prvi puta u prodaji. Kompletno renovirana 2022. godine, uključujući krov, fasadu, prozore, vrata, podove, kupaonice i kuhinju. Parcela od 1241 m2 s originalnim terasama ograđena je suhozidima. Nikad iznajmljivana! Vila se prodaje prazna bez namještaja. … Vila se nalazi na odličnoj lokaciji samo 100 m od plaže i 50 m od dućana. Kuća se nalazi na jednom od najljepših otoka na Jadranu, na Malom Lošinju, u prekrasnom mjestu Nerezine sa samo 390 stanovnika, udaljenom od vreve i bučnih hotela… Sastoji se od prizemlja i 1. kata, svaki s odvojenim ulazom. Prizemlje (78 m2): dnevni boravak, kamin, blagavaonica, kuhinja, kupaonica, 1 spavaća soba, terasa (25m2) 1. kat (77 m2): dnevni boravak, čajna kuhinja, kupaonica, 2 spavaće sobe, terasa (5m2) U prekrasnom vrtu s palmama nalazi se i veliki ugrađeni roštilj te jacuzzi. Ispred kuće nalazi se 1 natkriveno te dva nenatkrivena parkirna mjesta, a ograda se otvara daljinskim upravljačem. --- ORIGINAL HISTORIC ISLAND VACATION VILLA One of a kind original historic island vacation villa built in 1968 for sale for the first time. Complete remodel including roof, stucco, windows, doors, floors, bathrooms and kitchen finished in 2022. Surrounded by local stone walls, gated property of 1241 sq meters with native patios. Never rented! The villa is being sold empty without furniture. ... The house is located in the beautiful small town of Nerezine with only 390 inhabitants, only 100 m from the beach, far from the bustle and noisy hotel, on Mali Lošinj, one of the most beautiful islands in the Adriatic. It consists of a ground floor and a first floor, each with a separate entrance. Ground floor (78 m2): living room, fireplace, dining room, kitchen, bathroom, 1 bedroom, terrace (25m2) 1st floor (77 m2): living room, kitchenette, bathroom, 2 bedrooms, terrace (5m2) In the beautiful garden with palm trees there is also a large built-in barbecue and a jacuzzi. In front of the house there is 1 covered and two uncovered parking spaces, and the gate opens with a remote control. Additional information: Heating: Electrical devices/ Air conditioner on every floor Infrastructure: City water supply, City sewage supply Ownership: Clean title, Building permit, Usage permit Parking: Covered open space 1 + 2 uncovered Other: Jacuzzi in the garden, barbecue ...
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Grijalice i radijatori na struju
adresa_agencije: Adresa:Kneza Branimira 29, 10000 Zagreb, Grad Zagreb, Hrvatska
